Lemonhead
s: September 20, 2024 - Lemonhead® candy has been puckering lips since its debut in 1962, when Nello Ferrara was inspired by his newborn son's lemon-like head. Using the same panning technique as Red Hots® candy, the Lemonhead® brand quickly became a hit with its unique blend of sweet and sour.

t: Lemonhead Candy
s: Lemonhead is the original lemon candy with a sweet and sour shell. Invented by Ferrara, the candy is made using a cold panned process where sugar and flavors are added layer after layer until the candy is the perfect size. The yellow favorite was first picked off the candy tree in 1962 and ...
